Each year it welcomes nearly 4000+ students in their undergraduate, postgraduate, and professional courses in these fields. Students are admitted to the college through its entrance exams UGAT, PGAT, LAT conducted by the University of Allahabad followed by a counseling session and merit list.

Established in 1913, the college is affiliated to Banaras Hindu University (BHU). VCW BHU is recognised by the UGC and accredited by the NAAC with an ‘A+’ grade. It is one of the oldest colleges in the Banaras for Women and is spread over 300 acres of land.

Besides permanent faculty, visiting Teachers from Royal Drawing School, London provide an innovative and inspiring educational experience to the students. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qulaifying examination and artwork submitted. College_Summary: College of Veterinary and Animal Husbandry, Mathura was founded late back in the year 1947. The college aims in contribution towards animal health and production, it is known for its teaching practices and research programme undertaken. It was established in Mathura city keeping in mind the livestock, as many gaushalas are found in this area, being birth place of lord Krishna who was known for keeping animal wealth, cows in particular. Recognizing importance of livestock and its milk production and other dairy product in the city Government of Uttar Pradesh established this college in Mathura in 1947.

Purvanchal Institute of Dental Sciences has a well-architectured campus spread over 11 Acres consisting of an administrative block, academic block, clinical block, laboratories, library, canteen, separate boys and girls hostel, and faculty residences. The college offers admissions to Undergraduate (BDS) and Postgraduate (MDS) degrees in the dental stream which are affiliated to Dr. Ram Manohar Lohia Awadh University. The admissions are done on the basis of scores obtained by the candidates in the NEET UG and PG examinations respectively. The BDS and MDS have 100 and 33 seats respectively; the admission form’s availability is notified through major newspapers. Many specializations such as Orthodontics, Periodontology, etc. are included inside the dental department of the college.

SDC vision is to emerge as an excellent center for skilled, professional, technical and scholastic research & education nationally and internationally. SDC mission is to sculpture a firm foundation for efficient administration of numerous high quality research and training programmes to yield friendly, phlegmatic, self-standing and trust-worthy dentists for oral & dental issues. College_Summary: Teerthanker Mahaveer Dental College and Research Centre, Moradabad boasts of being among the top dental colleges of the country. It provides a quality teaching, research and extension in the field of dentistry. The College is well equipped with ultra-modern equipment to create a comfortable ambience not only for educational purposes but also patient care. It aims to churn out professional who are not only aware of the latest advancements in the field of oral healthcare but are also ethical and competent enough to contribute to the society by the way of eradication of all dental problems. The college encourages both the faculty and the students to participate in national as well as international seminars, conferences and workshops. This helps them enhance their knowledge.

Amazon Institute of Hotel Management, established in 1997 is a private institute which is located in Noida, Uttar Pradesh. Amazon Institute offers BHM and MBA in various disciplines at the undergraduate and the postgraduate level. The college also offers Diploma and Certification courses in diverse disciplines. Admission to the MBA and BHM courses offered by AIHM is done based on the candidate’s performance in entrance exams followed by a personal interview round. The training and placement cell at AIHM aims at providing 100% placement assistance to its students. Some of the top recruiters that recruit AIHM’s students include Carlson, Hilton, Accor, The Leela, Hyatt Regency, National and International Pathway etc.

The Institute is dedicated to providing its students with innovative programs dedicated to bridge management, Science and technology and enterprise. College_Summary: IPEM LAW ACADEMY Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh, A crucial part of IPEM group of institutes, IPEM Law Academy was established in 2005 to impart educational services in Law as a growing and a field in demand. It is an ‘A’ Category nationally recognized center for learning, where full encouragement is given to the scholars to become futuristic in their approach and endorse the qualities of being legal professionals of tomorrow. The Academy believes in providing its students a congenial ambience, conducive to learning and education and to excel in their chosen field.

College_Name: Janhit Group of Institutions, Greater Noida
College_Summary: Janhit Group of Institutions (JGI), Greater Noida was established in 2001, is accredited by UGC & BCI, affiliated to CCSU, Meerut. The institute offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the disciplines of Management, Humanities, Education, Science, Law, Commerce and Computer Applications. Admission to JGI Greater Noida is done on the basis of marks obtained in All India Entrance cum Scholarship Test (JGICET) conducted by the JGI. The university awards various scholarships to the deserving and needy students. The faculty at the institute are highly qualified and experienced.

College_Name: K. S. Saket PG College, Ayodhya
College_Summary: K.S. Saket P.G. College was established in 1951 at Faizabad, Uttar Pradesh. This institution is managed by Shri Saket Mahavidyalaya Samiti. It is affiliated to Dr. Ram Manohar Lohia Awadh University, Faizabad and approved by University Grants Commission (UGC) has five disciplines namely: Arts, Science, Commerce, Law and Education and over 30 courses.

Kamkus College of Law is a private institute featured among Top Law Colleges in Ghaziabad. The college is popularly known for its BA.LLB and LLB programs are offered at the undergraduate level. The admissions to both programs are granted on the basis of the candidate’s merit in the last qualifying examinations. No separate entrance tests are conducted for the same.

College_Summary: Mewar Institute is located in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh. The Institute has blossomed into a full-fledged academic institute and comprises three campuses Mewar Institute of Management, Mewar Law Institute and Mewar Girls Business School offering B.Ed., B.Lib., M.B.E., B.B.A., B.C.A., M.Sc. (Biotech), M.Sc. (Information Science) and M.Sc. (Computer Science), BA LL.B. 5 yr., LL.B. 3 yr. and M.B.A. (Only for Girls). Mewar Law Institute is a full fledged Institute imparting full time programmes in BA LL.B. for 5 years and LL.B. for 3 years.The Institute offers the state of the art facilities for the overall development and growth of students adhering to high academic standards. The students are mentored by well qualified, experienced and dedicated faculty.

College_Summary: Modern College of Law, Ghaziabad was established in 2003 under the aegis of Ganesh Shiksha Samiti. The college is situated in a sprawling campus at Mohan Nagar, Ghaziabad. It is very well connected by road and Train. The College has dedicated itself to search out the young men of substance and shape in their abilities to take on the challenge ahead of them, at a global level. The main objective of the college is to develop awareness about the role of education in building up a democratic, secular and socialistic pattern of society, to provide educational and Personality Development for preparing worthy citizens of tomorrow and to create an enabling environment for holistic development of students through academic, extra-curricular and socially meaningful activities.  The college offers education in the field of Law
